dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: Through the power of not actually checking the length of the text, you can only have 160 characters per textbox, 80 per line!

dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: (I've infiltrated the belligerent foreign nation Dalmyr's capital city Frostheim without any suspicion.)

dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: (Later tonight, an advanced weapons system will be launched.)

dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: (My objective was made clear by HQ.)

dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: (...and stop the attack before it can even begin!)

dialogue.name: Traitor
dialogue.text: (I'm approaching the target site right now.)
